alert.note: Alert for Labette; Montgomery (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 8:22PM CDT until September 19 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Labette County in southeastern Kansas... Southeastern Montgomery County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 822 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near South Coffeyville, or near Coffeyville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Coffeyville and Coffeyville Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
